info.description:
Vintage floral theme for facebook by OctoberFly.
***12/5-Updated the setting dropdown menu***
info.additionalInfo: To prevent my bandwidth from exceeding, I would appreciate it if all of you can host the images in your own account / web. Here are all the images used for this theme; https://www.box.com/s/c3e2ad827cc0d27d74ee I don't know where to host my images so HAHA, I'm praying my bandwidth wont exceed. :P
